definitions.definition: A milk -based product stiffened by a bacterium -aided curdling process, and sometimes mixed with fruit or other flavoring .
Any similar product based on other substances (e.g. soy yogurt ).

main_definition: A milk -based product stiffened by a bacterium -aided curdling process, and sometimes mixed with fruit or other flavoring .
secondary_definitions: ( especially in compounds ) Any similar product based on other substances (e.g. soy yogurt ).
